com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

Class TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<TaggedToken<T>>
          • com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.TaggedTokenSequence<TokeniserOutcome>
            • com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationSolution, Solution, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence>, java.lang.Iterable<TaggedToken<TokeniserOutcome>>, java.util.Collection<TaggedToken<TokeniserOutcome>>, java.util.List<TaggedToken<TokeniserOutcome>>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence
extends TaggedTokenSequence<TokeniserOutcome>
implements ClassificationSolution, java.lang.Comparable<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence>
    A sequence of atomic tokens tagged with tokeniser decisions, from which a series of predicted tokens can be inferred.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
